Our mission is developing young leaders

We develop and enable self-disciplined, confident and responsible young New Zealanders.

Find out more about leadership in NZCF >

We aim for adventure

To foster a spirit of adventure and teamwork, and to develop those qualities of mind and body essential for good citizens and leaders.

Courage, Commitment, Comradeship, Integrity
